channel.title: Comments on: The Trip – Day 20 – Bryce Canyon, Utah
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Eti: Not sure about saying "Hagomel". It's not really something I believe in. It was fun to talk to everyone on the phone today. The kids are really adorable.
item.content:encoded: Eti: Not sure about saying “Hagomel”. It’s not really something I believe in. It was fun to talk to everyone on the phone today. The kids are really adorable.

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
rom: I know. This little thing is really amazing. I'm surprised att how useful it is :) Unfortunately, it will not be so useful in Israel :S
Ariel: I had a mocha in a bottle. I guess it can count as coffee. But I will take Yotvata Mocha over it any time.
item.content:encoded:
rom: I know. This little thing is really amazing. I’m surprised att how useful it is :) Unfortunately, it will not be so useful in Israel :S

Ariel: I had a mocha in a bottle. I guess it can count as coffee. But I will take Yotvata Mocha over it any time.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
Let me get it straight, did you have your first coffee??!! Cool ;)
[admit that this is better than telling you 'YOU DUMB ASS'...]
item.content:encoded:
Let me get it straight, did you have your first coffee??!! Cool ;)

[admit that this is better than telling you ‘YOU DUMB ASS’…]

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: Wow, what an adventure. U better use this black-magic-voodo GPS of yours more!
item.content:encoded: Wow, what an adventure. U better use this black-magic-voodo GPS of yours more!

item.title: By: 725176
item.description: You have to say "Birkat Hagomel" in the first synagogue you can find... I also thought it ius some kind of "tironut", the one that never stops through life. We missed you here today!
item.content:encoded:
You have to say “Birkat Hagomel” in the first synagogue you can find…
I also thought it ius some kind of “tironut”, the one that never stops through life.
We missed you here today!

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
udim: Yeah, only that dog does a much better job going through that snow than I did.
sharper: I didn't even know they were called soup almonds :) And indeed that's a good choice of a gift, but I don't know if I can send food over to the US.
Thanks!
item.content:encoded:
udim: Yeah, only that dog does a much better job going through that snow than I did.

sharper: I didn’t even know they were called soup almonds :) And indeed that’s a good choice of a gift, but I don’t know if I can send food over to the US.

Thanks!

item.title: By: sharper
item.dc:creator: sharper
item.description: You should definitely send them soup almonds!
item.content:encoded: You should definitely send them soup almonds!
